Unit Converter
Introduction
This is a PyQt-based Unit Converter that can handle conversions between various units of Length, Temperature, Area, Weight, and Time. It provides an intuitive GUI, and automatically converts as the user enters values. The conversion logic is implemented in Python.

Features
Five Conversion Tabs: The application provides five separate tabs for conversions between units of Length, Temperature, Area, Weight, and Time.
Dynamic Conversion: The app dynamically performs conversions as the user enters values, providing instant feedback.
Wide Variety of Units: This application supports a variety of units under each category. These include but are not limited to:
Length: Millimeter, Centimeter, Meter, Kilometer, Mile, Yard, Foot, Inch
Temperature: Celsius, Kelvin, Fahrenheit
Area: Square Kilometer, Square Mile, Hectare, Acre
Weight: Gram, Kilogram, Pound, Ounce
Time: Second, Minute, Hour, Day, Week, Month, Year
Development
This application is developed in Python using the PyQt library for the GUI. The conversions are performed using lambdas for each unit to convert to and from a chosen base unit.

Dependencies
Python 3.6+
PyQt5
